short.zh_CN: ⭐专业标签管理工具，构建自己的链接收藏夹

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
a Tab Manager in side panel
Ever tried having 20 tabs or more open in Chrome? You can’t even see the favicon of the tabs, not to mention the tab titles! If that happens to you, 
Tabtab is a must-have extension that manages your tabs, reduces your tab overflow, and saves your sanity!
